description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

27 Alwyne Road, Islington, London, N1 2HN

TPO Reference:

T21- Ash of LBI TPO (No.346) 2007
T19 - Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.346) 2007

PO Number:

T100087

Work specifications:

1 x Ash (T21) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.346) 2007
Fell to ground level

1 x Sycamore (T19) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.346) 2007
Raise crown to the height of the guttering by the removal of epicomic growth from the trunk, prune back to clear the property by 2m and thin the remainder of the crown by up to 20%.
decision_conditions: The application for the removal of T21 of LBI TPO(No.346) 2007 has been approved on the condition that a Tulip tree is planted in the same location within one year of the Ash trees removal. The size of the replacement tree shall be no smaller than heavy standard and the tree shall be afforded the same protected  status as the Ash that is removed.
